name: Wedding Planning
detailedDescription: Let our expert wedding planners take care of every detail, from venue selection to coordinating vendors and managing your budget. We'll bring your vision to life and ensure a stress-free wedding day.

name: Venue Decoration
shortDescription: Transform your venue into a fairytale setting.
detailedDescription: Our creative decorators will turn your chosen venue into a magical space, with stunning floral arrangements, lighting, and decor that matches your theme and style perfectly.

name: Catering Services
shortDescription: Delicious cuisine for your special day.
detailedDescription: Treat your guests to a memorable dining experience with our top-notch catering services. From appetizers to desserts, our chefs create mouthwatering dishes that will leave a lasting impression.

name: Photography & Videography
detailedDescription: Our skilled photographers and videographers will document your wedding day with style and grace. From candid shots to cinematic videos, we'll create lasting memories you can cherish forever.

name: Floral Arrangements
detailedDescription: Enhance the beauty of your wedding with our exquisite floral arrangements. We create bouquets, centerpieces, and decorations that add a touch of natural beauty to your celebration.

name: Entertainment
shortDescription: Keep your guests entertained throughout the event.
detailedDescription: From live bands and DJs to photo booths and interactive games, our entertainment options ensure your guests have a fantastic time at your wedding, creating unforgettable moments.

name: Makeup & Hairstyling
shortDescription: Look your best on your special day.
detailedDescription: Our professional makeup artists and hairstylists will enhance your natural beauty and create a stunning bridal look that complements your style and personality. You'll shine on your wedding day.

name: Transportation
shortDescription: Arrive in style on your special day.
detailedDescription: Choose from a range of transportation options, from classic cars to luxury limousines, to make a grand entrance and exit at your wedding venue. We ensure you arrive in style.
